info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 2:48AM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with 4 to 8 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands and Southern Twin Falls County zones, including highway 93 and highway 51 near the Nevada border. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The combination of snow and gusty winds will result in reduced visibility on roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
